init.description: The dryer multi-swipe button is a shortcut that swipes your card multiple times in a specific dryer. This is a quick way to run longer dryer cycles. For dryers with a 30 min base time and 5 minute topoffs, enter "7" for a one hour load. (This automates one 30-minute base swipe and six 5-minute topoff swipes.)
init.title: Dryer Multi-Swipe Options
